headline: PepsiCo Leadership And Spain Restructuring Put Valuation And Dividend In Focus
summary: PepsiCo, NasdaqGS:PEP, has appointed Savitha Balachandran as Chief Financial Officer for India and South Asia, following the retirement of the previous regional CFO. The company is restructuring its operations in Spain by shifting to an indirect distribution model that is expected to result in job cuts. These changes affect PepsiCo’s leadership structure in a key regional hub and its workforce and distribution setup in a major European market. PepsiCo’s shares recently closed at $148.5,...

headline: Buffett Avoided Tesla for Years — But Now His Company Will Power Elon Musk's Semis
summary: Legendary investor Warren Buffett famously passed at investing in Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) stock over the years in the investment portfolio of conglomerate Berkshire Hathaway Inc (NYSE:BRK)(NYSE:BRK). While Berkshire still isn't investing in Tesla stock, the company could help validate the upcoming volume production of the Tesla Semi.
